Our Services

Comprehensive Security Solutions

We provide comprehensive security and facilities management solutions designed to protect your business and maintain your premises to the highest standards.

Static Guarding

Professional on-site security personnel providing round-the-clock protection for your premises.

  • 24/7 manned security presence
  • Access control and visitor management
  • Incident response and reporting
Learn More

Corporate Protection & Security

Comprehensive security solutions tailored for corporate environments and business facilities.

  • Executive protection services
  • Corporate event security
  • Risk assessment and consultation
Learn More

Immediate Response Team

Rapid deployment security teams ready to respond to urgent situations and emergencies.

  • 24/7 emergency response
  • Rapid deployment capabilities
  • Crisis management support
Learn More

Event Security

Specialized security services for events, conferences, and public gatherings of all sizes.

  • Crowd management and control
  • Access control and ticketing
  • VIP protection services
Learn More

Mobile Patrols

Regular security patrols covering multiple sites with flexible scheduling and reporting.

  • Scheduled and random patrols
  • GPS tracking and reporting
  • Multi-site coverage
Learn More

Concierge Services

Professional front-of-house services combining security with customer service excellence.

  • Reception and visitor management
  • Mail and package handling
  • Building access control
Learn More

Specialized Sectors

Industries We Serve

We serve a diverse range of industries with tailored solutions that meet specific sector requirements and regulations.

Warehouse Facilities Management

Sarah Johnson

Office Manager, Professional Services

Michael Brown

Warehouse Manager, Distribution

“The security team has transformed our warehouse operations. Their static guarding service provides 24/7 protection, and their mobile patrols ensure comprehensive coverage. The incident reporting is detailed and professional. We feel completely secure.”

“PGS FM's event security team is exceptional. They handled our corporate conference with over 500 attendees flawlessly. Their crowd management skills and professional approach made our event run smoothly. Highly recommended for any large gathering.”
